title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 3.44 - Executive Order No. 44: [Amending Executive Order No. 35 (Section 3.35, supra.]
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 3.44 - Executive Order No. 44: [Amending Executive Order No. 35 (Section 3.35, supra.]
State Regulations

The fourth paragraph of the order embodied in Executive

Order Number 35 and dated May 19, 1976, establishing a Mental Hygiene Medical

Review Board, is hereby amended to read as follows: Now, therefore, I, Hugh L. Carey, Governor of the State of

New York, by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and Laws
of this State, do hereby establish a Mental Hygiene Medical Review Board to be
composed of eight members, including specialists in forensic pathology, forensic psychiatry and internal medicine, to be appointed by the Governor to
serve at his pleasure. The Governor shall designate one of the members to serve
as Chairman of the Mental Hygiene Medical Review Board. Members of the Board
shall receive no compensation for their services but shall be reimbursed for
their actual and necessary expenses incurred in the performance of their
duties. Signed: Hugh L. Carey

Dated: December 8, 1976

Notes

3.44

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
